title: 🧑‍🎓 AI Powered Language Teacher with Telegram, Google Sheet and GPT-4o
author: Samir Saci
workflow_json:
{"meta":{"instanceId":"6a5e68bcca67c4cdb3e0b698d01739aea084e1ec06e551db64aeff43d174cb23","templateCredsSetupCompleted":true},"nodes":[{"id":"bc49829b-45f2-4910-9c37-907271982f14","name":"Sticky Note3","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[-1500,-520],"parameters":{"width":780,"height":540,"content":"### 3. Do you need more details?
Find a step-by-step guide in this tutorial
![Guide](https://www.samirsaci.com/content/images/2025/04/Flash-Cards.png)
[🎥 Watch My Tutorial](https://youtu.be/MQV8wDSug7M)"},"typeVersion":1},{"id":"80af5237-9046-4b40-ac7c-167d8e0a490f","name":"AI Agent","type":"@n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain.agent","notes":"Pinyin + Example","position":[-2140,-140],"parameters":{"text":"={{ $('Telegram Trigger').item.json.message.text }}","options":{"systemMessage":"=# Context
You are an AI-powered language tutor designed to help {{ $('Telegram Trigger').item.json.message.chat.first_name }} practice Chinese vocabulary efficiently. 

# Role
Your primary role is to generate interactive Multiple-Choice Questions (MCQs) and evaluate the user's responses.

# Types of Exercises
- MCQ: Provide an English word and four Chinese answer choices, one correct and three incorrect.

# Rules for MCQ Generation
1. Select a random **Chinese word** from this list {{ $json.targetLanguage }}
2. Randomly select **three incorrect Chinese options** from the list or outside the list.
3. **Do NOT mark the correct answer with ✅** in the question.
4. Present the question in the following format:
Example Question Format:
What is the correct translation for "Warehouse"?
A) 运输
B) 仓库 
C) 合同
D) 投标
5. Ask the user to respond with **A, B, C, or D**.

# Evaluating User Responses:
1. **Wait for the user's answer. Do NOT assume correctness before checking.**
2. If the user selects the correct answer:
- Respond positively: "Great job! ✅ [Correct Answer] [Correct Answer's Pinyin] means [English Meaning]."
3. If the user selects the wrong answer:
- Provide corrective feedback: "Oops! ❌ The correct answer was [Correct Answer] ([English Meaning])."
4. If the user provides an **invalid response** (e.g., "Hello"), ask them to respond with **A, B, C, or D**.

# Post-Evaluation:
- After giving feedback, always generate another question. Do not ask the user if he wants another question

# Behavior & Tone
- Be engaging and encouraging.
- Ensure clarity in feedback.
- Guide the user patiently if they provide invalid inputs."},"promptType":"define","hasOutputParser":true},"notesInFlow":true,"typeVersion":1.7},{"id":"8b35027e-ec5b-4c3e-9a5b-2780b6c40223","name":"OpenAI Chat Model","type":"@n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain.lmChatOpenAi","position":[-2180,100],"parameters":{"model":{"__rl":true,"mode":"list","value":"gpt-4o-mini"},"options":{}},"typeVersion":1.2},{"id":"688d6882-4930-407d-bf58-5f6add8eb159","name":"Simple Memory","type":"@n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain.memoryBufferWindow","position":[-2000,140],"parameters":{"sessionKey":"={{ $('Telegram Trigger').item.json.message.chat.id }}","sessionIdType":"customKey"},"typeVersion":1.3},{"id":"33f4a062-73f9-4a99-abca-1184ef2c2a41","name":"Telegram Trigger","type":"n8n-nodes-base.telegramTrigger","position":[-2960,-140],"webhookId":"88179da7-9927-4bdc-8bd7-78022810b48e","parameters":{"updates":["message"],"additionalFields":{}},"notesInFlow":true,"typeVersion":1.1},{"id":"af385807-d024-477e-9a42-c195043e95da","name":"Retrive Vocabulary","type":"n8n-nodes-base.googleSheets","position":[-2700,-140],"parameters":{"options":{},"sheetName":{"__rl":true,"mode":"list","value":0,"cachedResultUrl":"=","cachedResultName":"="},"documentId":{"__rl":true,"mode":"list","value":"=","cachedResultUrl":"=","cachedResultName":"="}},"notesInFlow":true,"typeVersion":4.5},{"id":"3ab67ca5-9839-4fa6-bfc1-4dbbaf5593fc","name":"Sticky Note1","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[-3000,-520],"parameters":{"color":7,"width":680,"height":540,"content":"### 1. Workflow Trigger with Telegram Message
1. The workflow is triggered by a user message. 
2. The second node retrieves the vocabulary list from a Google Sheet.
3. The third node combines all the words in Chinese and English in two distinctive lists.

#### How to setup?
- **Telegram Node:** set up your telegram bot credentials
[Learn more about the Telegram Trigger Node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/trigger-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegramtrigger/)
- **Retrieve Vocabulary from a Google Sheet Node**:
   1. Add your Google Sheet API credentials to access the Google Sheet file
   2. Select the file using the list, an URL or an ID
   3. Select the sheet in which you have stored your vocabulary list
  [Learn more about the Google Sheet Node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googlesheets)
"},"typeVersion":1},{"id":"740a2d04-46fe-41f1-b887-f88f3e23c50d","name":"Sticky Note","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[-2300,-520],"parameters":{"color":7,"width":760,"height":780,"content":"### 2. Conversational AI Agent
The AI agent will take as inputs the two vocabulary lists and user's message to asks questions and process answers. Conversations are recorded by chat id; each user has its own conversation with the bot.

#### How to setup?
- **Telegram Nodes:** set up your telegram bot credentials
[Learn more about the Telegram Trigger Node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/trigger-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegramtrigger/)
- **AI Agent with the Chat Model**:
   1. Add a chat model with the required credentials *(Example: Open AI 4o-mini)*
   2. Adapt the system prompt with the **target learning language** and the format of the question you want to have.
"},"typeVersion":1},{"id":"e92a55dc-6d9d-4008-bb40-72a7f2dd470c","name":"Aggregate Vocabulary Lists","type":"n8n-nodes-base.aggregate","position":[-2460,-140],"parameters":{"options":{},"fieldsToAggregate":{"fieldToAggregate":[{"renameField":true,"outputFieldName":"initialLanguage","fieldToAggregate":"initialText"},{"renameField":true,"outputFieldName":"targetLanguage","fieldToAggregate":"translatedText"}]}},"typeVersion":1},{"id":"18b29677-cfc0-4817-9321-35090a3fda2e","name":"Answer to the User","type":"n8n-nodes-base.telegram","position":[-1740,-140],"webhookId":"=","parameters":{"text":"={{ $json.output }}","chatId":"={{ $('Telegram Trigger').item.json.message.chat.id }}","additionalFields":{"appendAttribution":false}},"notesInFlow":true,"typeVersion":1.2}],"pinData":{},"connections":{"AI Agent":{"main":[[{"node":"Answer to the User","type":"main","index":0}]]},"Simple Memory":{"ai_memory":[[{"node":"AI Agent","type":"ai_memory","index":0}]]},"Telegram Trigger":{"main":[[{"node":"Retrive Vocabulary","type":"main","index":0}]]},"OpenAI Chat Model":{"ai_languageModel":[[{"node":"AI Agent","type":"ai_languageModel","index":0}]]},"Retrive Vocabulary":{"main":[[{"node":"Aggregate Vocabulary Lists","type":"main","index":0}]]},"Aggregate Vocabulary Lists":{"main":[[{"node":"AI Agent","type":"main","index":0}]]}}}
readme:
_Tags: Productivity, Education, Learning, Language_

### Context

I’m a **Supply Chain Data Scientist from Paris** who lived six years in China — and yes, **learning Mandarin while working full-time was tough**.

![Mandarin is hard to learn \(In Mandarin\)](https://www.samirsaci.com/content/images/size/w1000/2025/03/image-24.png)

Learning Mandarin as an adult can be very difficult, especially if you have a full-time job. With AI, you can now have a **Chinese tutor available 24/7** on your phone — no excuses left!

It is with this spirit that I designed this workflow to support fellow Mandarin learners with a **Chinese Teacher powered by GPT-4o**.

> Boost your **language skills** with AI using N8N!

📬 For business inquiries, you can add me on [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/samir-saci)

### Who is this template for?

This workflow template is designed for **language learners** and **educators** who need support to learn a vocabulary list in Mandarin (or any other language) using **Open AI GPT-4o** , an **AI agent** and a **Telegram Bot** to interact with users.

![Example of Flash Card](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1*q3203G-NbZGg1dqHewNgWA.png)

For the vocabulary list, you can use another template shared in my profile [🉑 Generate Anki Flash Cards for Language Learning with Google Translate and GPT-4o](https://n8n.io/workflows/3195-generate-anki-flash-cards-for-language-learning-with-google-translate-and-gpt-4o/) to generate the Google Sheet needed in this workflow.

### How does it work?

The workflow loads a **vocabulary list** stored in your **Google Sheet**.

![Screen of the Google Sheet](https://www.samirsaci.com/content/images/2025/03/image-9.png)

The bot will:

  1. 📥 Load your vocabulary list from Google Sheets
  2. 🧠 Generate multiple-choice questions with GPT-4o
  3. ✅ Evaluate your answer and give instant feedback
  4. 🔁 Loop to the next word until you're fluent



![Example of Google Sheet](https://www.samirsaci.com/content/images/2025/03/image-12.png)

These fields will be automatically added to a Google Sheet, ready to be loaded in Anki to create flash cards.

### What do I need to start?

This workflow does not require any advanced programming skills.

#### Prerequisite

  * A **Google Drive Account** with a folder including a Google Sheet filled with the vocabulary list you want to learn.
  * API Credentials: **Open AI API** for the chat model, **Google Drive API** and **Google Sheets API** activated with OAuth2 credentials
  * A **Telegram Bot** with its token recorded in the Telegram Node Credentials
  * **A Google Sheet** with two columns (initialText: words in your own language, translatedText: words in the target language)



### Next Steps

Follow the sticky notes to set up the parameters inside each node and get ready to pump your learning skills.

![Tutorial ScreenShot](https://www.samirsaci.com/content/images/2025/04/Flash-Cards.png)  
[🎥 Watch My Tutorial](https://youtu.be/MQV8wDSug7M)

🚀 Curious how N8N can supercharge learning or supply chain?  
📬 Let’s connect on [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/samir-saci)

* * *

### Notes

  * This workflow can be used **for any language**. In the AI Agent prompt, you just need to replace Chinese with your language.



This workflow has been created with N8N 1.82.1  
Submitted: March 23th, 2025
readme_html:
Tags: Productivity, Education, Learning, Language

Context

I’m a Supply Chain Data Scientist from Paris who lived six years in China — and yes, learning Mandarin while working full-time was tough.

Learning Mandarin as an adult can be very difficult, especially if you have a full-time job. With AI, you can now have a Chinese tutor available 24/7 on your phone — no excuses left!

It is with this spirit that I designed this workflow to support fellow Mandarin learners with a Chinese Teacher powered by GPT-4o.

Boost your language skills with AI using N8N!

📬 For business inquiries, you can add me on LinkedIn

Who is this template for?

This workflow template is designed for language learners and educators who need support to learn a vocabulary list in Mandarin (or any other language) using Open AI GPT-4o, an AI agent and a Telegram Bot to interact with users.

For the vocabulary list, you can use another template shared in my profile 🉑 Generate Anki Flash Cards for Language Learning with Google Translate and GPT-4o to generate the Google Sheet needed in this workflow.

How does it work?

The workflow loads a vocabulary list stored in your Google Sheet.

The bot will:

  1. 📥 Load your vocabulary list from Google Sheets
  2. 🧠 Generate multiple-choice questions with GPT-4o
  3. ✅ Evaluate your answer and give instant feedback
  4. 🔁 Loop to the next word until you're fluent

These fields will be automatically added to a Google Sheet, ready to be loaded in Anki to create flash cards.

What do I need to start?

This workflow does not require any advanced programming skills.

Prerequisite

  • A Google Drive Account with a folder including a Google Sheet filled with the vocabulary list you want to learn.
  • API Credentials: Open AI API for the chat model, Google Drive API and Google Sheets API activated with OAuth2 credentials
  • A Telegram Bot with its token recorded in the Telegram Node Credentials
  • A Google Sheet with two columns (initialText: words in your own language, translatedText: words in the target language)

Next Steps

Follow the sticky notes to set up the parameters inside each node and get ready to pump your learning skills.


🎥 Watch My Tutorial

🚀 Curious how N8N can supercharge learning or supply chain?
📬 Let’s connect on LinkedIn

Notes

  • This workflow can be used for any language. In the AI Agent prompt, you just need to replace Chinese with your language.

This workflow has been created with N8N 1.82.1

readme_zh:
_标签：生产力、教育、学习、语言_

### 背景  
我是一名**来自巴黎的供应链数据科学家**，曾在中国生活六年——没错，**全职工作之余学习普通话确实很艰难**。  

![学中文很难（中文版）](https://www.samirsaci.com/content/images/size/w1000/2025/03/image-24.png)  

成年后学习普通话可能非常困难，尤其当你还有全职工作时。如今借助AI，你可以**在手机上拥有24小时在线的中文老师**——再也没有借口了！  

正是怀着这样的初衷，我设计了这套工作流，通过**基于GPT-4o的中文教师**为普通话学习者提供支持。  

> 用N8N结合AI**提升你的语言能力**！  

📬 商务合作请通过[领英](https://www.linkedin.com/in/samir-saci)联系我  

### 适用人群  
本工作流模板专为**语言学习者**和**教育工作者**设计，可通过**OpenAI GPT-4o**、**AI代理**和**Telegram机器人**辅助学习中文（或其他语言）词汇表。  

![单词卡示例](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1*q3203G-NbZGg1dqHewNgWA.png)  

词汇表可从我主页的另一个模板生成：[🉑 用Google翻译和GPT-4o生成Anki单词卡](https://n8n.io/workflows/3195-generate-anki-flash-cards-for-language-learning-with-google-translate-and-gpt-4o/)，以创建本工作流所需的Google表格。  

### 运作原理  
工作流会加载**Google表格**中存储的**词汇表**。  

![Google表格界面](https://www.samirsaci.com/content/images/2025/03/image-9.png)  

机器人将：  
1. 📥 从Google表格加载词汇表  
2. 🧠 通过GPT-4o生成选择题  
3. ✅ 评估答案并即时反馈  
4. 🔁 循环至下一个单词直至掌握  

![Google表格示例](https://www.samirsaci.com/content/images/2025/03/image-12.png)  

这些字段会自动添加到Google表格，可直接导入Anki制作单词卡。  

### 准备工作  
无需高级编程技能即可使用。  

#### 前提条件  
- **Google Drive账户**：内含存储目标词汇表的Google表格  
- **API凭证**：需启用**OpenAI API**、**Google Drive API**和**Google Sheets API**的OAuth2认证  
- **Telegram机器人**：将其令牌录入Telegram节点凭证  
- **Google表格**：需含两列（initialText: 母语词汇，translatedText: 目标语言词汇）  

### 后续步骤  
按便签提示设置各节点参数，即刻开启高效学习。  

![教程截图](https://www.samirsaci.com/content/images/2025/04/Flash-Cards.png)  
[🎥 观看教程视频](https://youtu.be/MQV8wDSug7M)  

🚀 想了解N8N如何助力学习或供应链优化？  
📬 欢迎通过[领英](https://www.linkedin.com/in/samir-saci)联系  

* * *  

### 注意事项  
- 本工作流**适用于任何语言**，只需在AI代理提示中将"中文"替换为目标语言  

本工作流基于N8N 1.82.1创建  
提交日期：2025年3月23日
title_zh: 🧑‍🎓 由Telegram、Google表格与GPT-4o驱动的AI语言教师
